Name: Achievement Lurker: You are going to have to work hard for these nuts
About the game: One of the last 5,000 achievement games you will see! Get your points in now before it's too late! It is a dark day in the land of eternal forest. Our hero Jacob can not find any nuts. Go on this fast paced adventure! along the way you will fight in turn based combats against various monsters of the Forrest. You will achieve great levels as you advance in the built in XP leveling system. Explore the dimensional map to uncover all that is hidden. RPG Combat Level UP Shop Inventory system
